page.title: 20LOCAL CELEBRITIES
page.content: The Sunninghill/Sunningdale area is quite famous for the number of famous people that decide to make their homes here.Richard Starkey better known as Ringo Starr of the now defunct Beatles lives on the edge of our Domesday area.Until last year when they died in seperate but tragic circumstances the famous British Actress Diana Dors and her husband were prominant figures in the community.Bruce Forsyth's name is often linked with the area due to his love of golf and the same can be said of Jimmy Tarbuck.Richard O'Sullivan has lived here for many years.The reasons behind this high concentration of celebrities must be the affluence of the area,the proximity to Royal Ascot and Wentworth/Sunningdale Golf Courses and its proximity to London. Whatever the reason it gives the area a certain flavour not found elsewhere.
